security_notes: Minimal data access; sends repository notifications only. SOC 2 Type II certified. Strong privacy policy with no third-party data selling.
Accesses file metadata to generate previews. Google is SOC 2 / ISO 27001 certified. Privacy policy is comprehensive but data may be used for ad targeting.
Collects meeting metadata. Has had past security vulnerabilities (resolved). SOC 2 Type II certified. Data encryption in transit and at rest.
Atlassian is ISO 27001 and SOC 2 Type II certified. Secure OAuth 2.0 integration. Limited data scope aligned to Jira issue notifications.
Minimal permissions; sends card/board activity notifications. Backed by Atlassian security infrastructure (SOC 2, ISO 27001).
SOC 2 Type II certified. Focused on incident alerting; does not collect personal data beyond authentication. Strong encryption practices.
Accesses CRM data which may contain sensitive customer information. Salesforce is ISO 27001 and SOC 2 certified. Strong enterprise security controls.
SOC 2 Type II certified. Notifications-focused integration with minimal data footprint. Supports SSO and strong access controls.
SOC 2 Type II certified. Reads page content to generate link previews. Data retention policies are reasonable and opt-out available.
SOC 2 Type II certified. Alert-only integration; does not read channel messages. ISO 27001 compliant with strong encryption.
Broad permissions due to automation capabilities. SOC 2 Type II certified, but extensive data access requires careful configuration. Review each Zap's data flow.
Minimal data scope; sends design file notifications and previews only. SOC 2 Type II certified. Strong privacy policy.
Accesses file metadata for previews. SOC 2 Type II certified with ISO 27001 compliance. Data encrypted at rest with AES-256.
Accesses CRM and marketing data. SOC 2 Type II certified. GDPR compliant. High data access scope should be reviewed against least-privilege principles.
Collects survey response data and user identities. SOC 2 compliant. Data used for analytics; review data retention settings. Not independently verified.
Tracks GIF search queries and usage patterns. Privacy policy allows sharing data with third parties including advertisers. Limited security certifications disclosed.
Enterprise automation platform with broad permissions. SOC 2 Type II and ISO 27001 certified. Data isolation per tenant. High access scope requires governance.
Accesses user profiles and channel membership to facilitate introductions. No major security incidents reported. Privacy policy lacks detail on data retention timelines.
Collects poll questions and responses. Minimal data scope beyond poll content. No known security incidents. Privacy policy is basic.
SOC 2 Type II certified. Reads calendar data to optimize scheduling. Clear data use policy. Does not sell personal data.
Google Meet (successor to Hangouts) is SOC 2 / ISO 27001 certified. Data handled under Google's comprehensive privacy policy. May be used for targeted advertising.
Sends campaign and audience notifications into Slack. SOC 2 Type II certified. GDPR and CCPA compliant. Data not sold to third parties.
Reads calendar events to provide reminders and scheduling info in Slack. Google is SOC 2 / ISO 27001 certified. Data may be used per Google's broad privacy policy.
Allows forwarding emails directly to Slack channels. Covered under Slack and Google's respective privacy policies. Data in transit is encrypted.
Delivers analytics reports to Slack. Data governed by Google's privacy policy. SOC 2 / ISO 27001 certified. Aggregated data only; no personal end-user data shared.
Shares design previews and notifications in Slack. SOC 2 Type II certified. GDPR compliant. Does not sell personal data.
Peer recognition platform for Slack. Collects user profile data to facilitate kudos and rewards. Privacy policy published by Springworks.
Team trivia game for Slack. Minimal data access limited to running quiz games. Privacy policy published by Springworks.
Collects and stores birthday and work anniversary dates for team members. Minimal data scope; no sensitive information accessed.
Employee mood and engagement tracking. Collects mood data tied to user identities. Privacy policy published on mymoodbit.com. Review data retention practices.
Employee engagement tool backed by Culture Amp. SOC 2 certified. Data handled under Culture Amp's comprehensive privacy policy.
Team knowledge base assistant for Slack. Accesses channel content to answer questions. Review data storage and retention practices.
Official Slack-built app for coordinating group lunches. Minimal data collection; built and maintained by Slack with strong security standards.
Sends automated welcome messages to new team members. Minimal data scope; primarily accesses user names and channel info.
Interactive polling and Q&A platform. Backed by Cisco's enterprise security infrastructure. SOC 2 certified. GDPR compliant.
Idea collection and management for Slack teams. Collects message content for idea capture. Privacy policy details limited.
Team check-in and status update tool. SOC 2 certified. Collects check-in and mood data linked to user identity. GDPR compliant.
Team wiki and knowledge management. SOC 2 Type II certified. Indexes workspace content for search. Data retention and deletion policies are clear.
Leave management and time-off tracking tool. Sends absence and vacation notifications to Slack. GDPR compliant with clear privacy policy.
Performance management and employee engagement platform. SOC 2 Type II certified. GDPR compliant. Data handled with strong security controls.
GIF search powered by Tenor (acquired by Google). Tracks search queries and usage patterns. Data handled under Google's broad privacy policy.
Employee engagement and recognition platform. Collects user profile data for rewards. Privacy policy published by Xoxoday/Empuls.
Health and productivity tracking app. Collects health and activity data tied to user identity. Review data sharing settings carefully.
Corporate food ordering and team lunch coordination. Minimal sensitive data; primarily order and preference information.
Gratitude and positive culture tool for teams. Minimal data collection. Privacy practices are basic; terms of use available on website.
Sends form submission notifications to Slack. SOC 2 Type II certified. GDPR compliant. Form responses may contain sensitive personal data.
Sends support ticket notifications and updates to Slack. SOC 2 Type II certified. GDPR compliant. Customer support data may include PII.
Live chat with website visitors via Slack. Handles customer conversation data. Review data retention settings for visitor conversations.
Shared inbox and customer communication platform. SOC 2 Type II certified. GDPR compliant. Handles customer email and message data.
AI-powered knowledge management platform. SOC 2 Type II certified. Indexes workspace content. GDPR and CCPA compliant.
Customer messaging and support platform. Sends customer conversation alerts to Slack. GDPR compliant. Handles customer PII.
Customer support helpdesk with Slack integration. Sends ticket notifications. Customer support data may contain sensitive PII.
Screen recording and visual communication tool. Shares media links in Slack. Minimal sensitive data beyond recorded content.
Customer feedback and NPS survey platform. Sends survey results to Slack. SOC 2 certified. Handles customer feedback data including PII.
B2B data enrichment platform. Accesses and enriches contact and company data. Now part of HubSpot. High data access scope requires careful review.
CRM integration sends deal and contact updates to Slack. ISO 27001 certified. GDPR compliant. High data access due to CRM record access.
Error tracking and monitoring. Sends error alerts and stack traces to Slack. SOC 2 Type II certified. Minimal data scope beyond error reports.
Private Q&A for development teams. SOC 2 Type II certified. GDPR compliant. Indexes team knowledge; review data retention policies.
Code repository notifications for pull requests, commits, and pipelines. SOC 2 Type II and ISO 27001 certified by Atlassian.
Design handoff tool. Sends design update notifications to Slack. SOC 2 certified. Minimal data access beyond design file metadata.
Project management platform. Sends task notifications and updates to Slack. SOC 2 Type II certified. GDPR compliant.
Formerly Integromat. Broad automation platform with extensive permissions. SOC 2 certified. High data access scope requires careful workflow review.
Error monitoring and crash reporting. Sends error alerts to Slack. Now part of SmartBear. SOC 2 certified. Minimal data scope.
Online wireframing and mockup tool. Shares design links in Slack. SOC 2 compliant. Minimal data access beyond design metadata.
On-call and incident management tool. Sends alert notifications to Slack. SOC 2 Type II and ISO 27001 certified by Atlassian.
Project management and issue tracking. Sends issue and commit notifications to Slack. Privacy policy published by Nulab.
Deploy and manage Heroku apps from Slack. SOC 2 certified under Salesforce. Requires access to deployment credentials and pipelines.
Analytics reporting bot for Slack. Connects to various analytics platforms. Data access depends on connected sources. Review connected integrations.
Live chat with website visitors via Slack. Handles customer conversations and PII. GDPR compliant. Review data retention for chat logs.
Brand monitoring and social listening tool. Sends mention alerts to Slack. Processes public social media data. GDPR compliant.
Business analytics and KPI dashboard. Sends metric alerts to Slack. SOC 2 certified. Data access limited to configured metrics.
B2B website visitor tracking. Sends lead alerts to Slack. GDPR compliant. Processes website visitor and company data.
Call tracking and analytics platform. Sends call notifications to Slack. SOC 2 certified. Processes call recordings and customer data.
Content research and social media analysis. Sends content alerts to Slack. Primarily processes public content data.
Link management and URL shortening platform. Sends link analytics to Slack. Minimal sensitive data beyond link tracking information.
Screenshot annotation and markup tool. Shares annotated images in Slack. Minimal data collection beyond annotation content.
Read-it-later service for saving and sharing articles. Backed by Mozilla's strong privacy principles. Minimal data access. Does not sell personal data.
Real-time event and news monitoring. Sends news and event alerts to Slack. Enterprise-grade security. Processes public social media and news data.
Newsletter and content curation tool. Sends curated content digests to Slack. Minimal data collection beyond subscription preferences.
Social media and web monitoring for brand mentions. Sends mention alerts to Slack. Processes public web data. GDPR compliant.
AI-powered knowledge assistant for Slack workspaces. Indexes workspace content to answer questions. Privacy policy published by Springworks.
Customer and employee feedback platform. Sends survey responses to Slack. Handles survey data including PII. GDPR compliant.
Note-taking and knowledge management. Shares Evernote content in Slack. SOC 2 certified. Handles personal notes which may contain sensitive data.
Personal task manager and to-do list. Sends task reminders and updates to Slack. Minimal sensitive data beyond task content.
Collaborative document editor by Salesforce. Shares document links and notifications in Slack. SOC 2 and ISO 27001 certified under Salesforce.
Work management and collaboration platform. Sends sheet updates to Slack. SOC 2 Type II and ISO 27001 certified. GDPR compliant.
Customer review aggregation and alerting. Sends review notifications to Slack. Processes public customer review data.
